name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (marievts)
description:
An easy tic tac toe game for boring moments when you are two.

Only available on android.

Credits :
Background music :

  • Pim Poy Pocket

Sound effects :

  • Player X : Click On
  • Player O : Button Click Off
  • End Sound : Air Plane Ding

This is my first build on android, they might be some problems, please tell me if you find one.
